00227    inline
00228    bool isAttributeId( uint32_t id )
00229    {
00230       return (id >= ATTRIBUTE_ID_FIRST && id <= ATTRIBUTE_ID_LAST);
00231    }
00232 
00233 
00234    inline
00235    bool isResponseId( uint32_t id )
00236    {
00237       return (id >= RESPONSE_ID_FIRST && id <= RESPONSE_ID_LAST);
00238    }
